div.p: This CodeSystem provides additional coded concepts for PlanDefinition.type to cover the representation of laboratory diagnostic services

tr.td: unitary measurement performed on an in vitro biologic specimen
collection of tests and panels performed on one or more in vitro biologic specimens

title.value: Code system for types of laboratory service definitions

description.value: This CodeSystem resource provides the concepts that enable to characterize laboratory diagnostic services described as instances of PlanDefinition, in the PlanDefinition.type element

display.value: unitary measurement performed on an in vitro biologic specimen
collection of tests and panels performed on one or more in vitro biologic specimens
